Package pddl4j.util

This package contains miscellaneous utility classes for the PDDL4J library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CodedOp
    This interface defines the main methods of to access to an operator whatever its representation.
    Constraint  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCodedOp
    This abstract class implements the common part of an operator what ever its representation, i.e., integer or bit set.
    AdjacencyMatrix
    This class implements an adjacency matrix to represent constraints and order graphs
    BitExp
    This class implements an bit set expression.
    BitMatrix
    This class implements a bit matrix.
    BitOp
    This class implements a compact representation for action based on BitSet structure.
    BitState
    This class implements a logical state.
    BitVector
    This class implements a bit vector.
    CondBitExp
    This class allows to implements a conditional effects of an operator.
    Generic_TN
    This class implements a task network in HTN planning.
    IntExp
    This class is used to encode expressions in compact encoding, i.e., with integer representation.
    LinkedNodes
    This class implements two list of nodes linked to one node
    MemoryAgent
    This class implements memory agent enable to compute approximation of the size of java objects.
    OneTaskConstraint
    This class implements a one task (before/after) constraint in HTN planning
    OrderConstraint
    This class implements an order constraint in HTN planning
    OrderedMethod
    This class implements a compact representation for method based on BitSet structure.
    Signature
    This class implements a task signature which contain the task name and the arguments.
    TaskList
    This class implements a task list in HTN planning.
    TaskNetwork
    This class implements a task network in HTN planning.
    TwoTasksConstraint
    This class implements a two tasks (between) constraint in HTN planning

Package pddl4j.util Description

This package contains miscellaneous utility classes for the PDDL4J library.
